named-query.name: EmployeeApplyDao.findEmployeeByStatus
named-query.query: select r from EmployeeApply r where r.emailEmployee.email = :email and r.status.statusId = :statusId

named-query.name: EmployeeApplyDao.findJobApplitationByEmailStatus
named-query.query: select new forms.ListJobApplication(r.id,u.fullName,r.fromDate,r.toDate,r.submitDate,rs.reasonName) from EmployeeApply r left join r.emailEmployee u left join r.reason rs where r.emailManager.email = :email and r.status.statusId = :statusId

named-query.name: EmployeeApplyDao.findEmployeeByEmail
named-query.query: select r from EmployeeApply r where r.emailEmployee.email = :email
